price: 14. Y cometí un crimen[713] contra ellos y temo que me maten”.
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ
footnotes: [713]  Ver la aleya 15 de la sura 28.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
